name: ninja vs darkness - great battles of the 80s
name_original: ninja vs darkness - great battles of the 80s
description:
game for [7]  game-jam "synth wave retro 80s" of Godot Engine Russia discord server.  
music and sounds obtained from the site freesoun.org
game developed on GODOT version 3.5 rc5

для начала игры нажмите  ESC и выберите "ИГРАТЬ"
to start the game, press ESC and select the purple button
